text: @ANI Sir’s @ArvindKejriwal @PMOIndia @narendramodi what are you guys waiting for!! These are the people who are funded to create huge disturbances in the society. Announce “shoot at sight” orders against them for the well being of our people in this crucial #covid19 situation
